column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=DS : You earlier spoke about modernity and the importance of science and how a lot of the terrorists are very scared of modernity and how it will affect their traditions yet one of Israel ’s greatest supporters are the evangelicals in America , who are often seen in America as fighters of science and modernity .
#Text=SP : Look , I am not going here to make a license office .
#Text=[ Chuckles ]
#Text=I can judge on the general trend but I am not going to make any one remark .
#Text=You know , one of the candidates is now Romney , who is a Mormon --
#Text=DS : Mitt Romney
#Text=SP : Yes , the Mormons too are becoming modern , and the evangelists they participate in all modernity .
#Text=They are not terrorists .
#Text=I mean , if you have an idea , you have an idea .
#Text=The problem begins when you want to shoot when you have a different idea , to kill the future .
#Text=You cannot kill it .
#Text=Nobody can kill the future .
#Text=Nobody can stop it .
#Text=The terrorists will discover that they cannot live on their traditions .
#Text=They will lose because they are not sustainable .
#Text=Take a simple , single item : the attitude towards women .
#Text=If they will not give equal rights to women , they will always be inferior because a nation that does n’t give equality to women is half a nation .
#Text=So by definition they are half of modern nations .
#Text=You lose a lot .
#Text=It ’s not that you lose the women ; you lose also the children because if the woman is uneducated , she cannot help the children to be educated .
#Text=She does n’t have to make a balance between the number of the children and the state of income of the family .
#Text=This contradiction will grow and grow and grow and grow .
#Text=It will take time , I do n’t know , it will take 5 years or ten years or fifteen years …
#Text=But it is so clear that they cannot make a living by killing others or by hanging on tradition .
#Text=Peres on his Presidency and learning from the future , not the past
#Text=DS : What do you hope to achieve with your presidency ?
#Text=SP : In the long term I would like to help our people to live on two foundations : on the heritage of our spirit and our talent at modernity .
#Text=That we should be as old spiritually as the Ten Commandments , and as new economically as the latest model of the Internet .
#Text=It ’s an educational process .
#Text=Here the proportion between authority and freedom is in favor of freedom .
#Text=Being free is the greatest , the best administration in life .
#Text=Administrations are still becoming old , they are becoming bureaucracies .
#Text=They represent a world that is disappearing .
#Text=The modern economy is based on global companies that do n’t have armies , do n’t have police ; that do n’t have laws .
#Text=They are based on good will , on inventions .
#Text=So I do n’t see any contradictions .

#Text=Since we shall always remain a small land and a small people , we have all time to see how to reach the size that is necessary to exist , to defend ourselves , to offer a future to our children .
